entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 12:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -24.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -30.4°C
Wind: WNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
